name: RiverScope
description: RiverScope is a global-scale, high-resolution satellite image dataset focused on rivers using PlanetScope and co-registered with other sensors SWOT, Landsat (via SWORD), and Sentinel-2. Our dataset contains expert-labeled water segmentation on PlanetScope images to capture fine details that high-resolution imagery better reveals. There are 1,145 images with pre-defined train/valid/test splits that can be used for research on fine-scale water segmentation, width estimation, and future multi-sensor hydrological modeling.
citeAs: Daroya, R., Rowley, T., Flores, J., Friedmann, E., Bennitt, F., An, H., Simmons, T., Hughes, M. J., Kluetmeier, C. L., Kica, S., Vélez, J. D., Esenther, S. E., Howard, T. E., Ye, Y., Turcotte, A., Gleason, C., & Maji, S. (2025). RiverScope: High-Resolution River Masking Dataset [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15376394
